main event: A UFO was observed in the sky over Dallas, Texas on March 15, 1964, described as moving in a southerly direction.
interesting points: The observation lasted for 5 minutes., The object appeared to be brighter than the naked eye and followed a southerly course., Witness descriptions noted wobbly motion across the sky., The analysis suggested the object was similar to known satellite sightings., The sighting was categorized as significant and worthy of further investigation.
witness description: Two persons observed the object, which appeared circular and luminous, traveling at a high rate of speed.
